title: Generating Structured Output from LLMs with AWS Lambda durable functions
description: Get JSON output from an LLM and validate it against a schema using AWS Lambda durable functions

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates structured output extraction with AWS Lambda durable functions. The LLM response is validated against a schema with automatic retry on validation errors.
The example uses an LLM to extract contact information from unstructured text and validates it using Pydantic (Python) or Zod (TypeScript).
Benefits: Automatic retry on validation failures without manual error handling. Schema enforcement ensures data quality. Checkpointing prevents re-extraction on transient failures.
